Threadcrafts’ favourite Spring Summer trends 2015

  • 05, 14, 2015
  •  Arpit Maheshwari 
  •  General 
  • No Comments.

 

So many trends, so much to wear and so much to catch up on! Threadcrafts, has made it easier with a list of ‘must-follow’ trends for spring/summer 2015!

1 Bohemian Paradise

The bohemian trend has a care-free and romantic aura. Flowy, dreamy, soft silhouettes, pretty prints and small detailing, is what you’re going to witness this summer.

 

2 Tassel drama

Tassels are known for adding movement and richness from simple fabrics to laid-back outfits. This time seen with a lot of new interpretations and design modifications!

 

3 Head to Toe White

White is almost an all season colour. Seen in a lot of crisp pants and suits it is making a strong and stark appearance and giving a whole new meaning to the tone.

 

4 Navy is the new black

This is a wardrobe investment, its neutral and the midnight blues make a good evening ensemble. Also, it’s high time we replaced the boring blacks and tried another shade.

 

Tell us how you would wear your favourite trend…We’d love to know!
